source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a time-lapse view from the bow of a container ship sailing on the open ocean. The sky is the main focus, with clouds moving rapidly across the frame. The scene transitions from daylight to a vibrant sunset with pink and purple hues, eventually revealing stars as night falls.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video presents a time-lapse view from the bow of a container ship sailing on the open ocean. The sky is the main focus, with clouds moving rapidly across the frame. The scene transitions from daylight to a vibrant sunset with pink and purple hues, eventually revealing stars as night falls.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several dolphins swim alongside the ship during the time-lapse, which is not reflected in the current description.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video presents a time-lapse view from the bow of a container ship sailing on the open ocean. The sky is the main focus, with clouds moving rapidly across the frame. Several dolphins swim alongside the ship, adding a lively touch to the scene. The scene transitions from daylight to a vibrant sunset with pink and purple hues, eventually revealing stars as night falls.
